Active learning: Engages attention, coordinates attention to the learning moment, and enhances uncertainty monitoring
Social learning: Increases arousal and enhances attention/memory processes

Active learning: Generates high quality input that is linked to prior knowledge,  hypotheses, and ability
Social learning: Generates high quality input shaped to the learner's current cognitive abilities and goals

Active learning: Behaviors selected without knowledge of the target concept, leading to weaker inferences and generalization
Social learning: Behaviors selected with knowledge of the target concept, leading to stronger inferences and generalization
